response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a high-quality asset at a price that reflects its true worth while also providing you with a significant advantage over your competitors. We are confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you in terms of both efficiency and profitability. Should you decide to proceed, we are prepared to facilitate a seamless transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
